channel.title: [PI]my bows names are -2 if i wield them how do i fix
channel.description: Hey guys,got a small problem been coding this source like 3weeks,now i finally found out that my bows are named -2 if i wield them,this is probs a noob question but how could i fix this? thanks in advance , Jelle

item.title: [PI]my bows names are -2 if i wield them how do i fix
item.dc:creator: @heartles heartles
item.description:
@heartles wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:443268”][quote author=heartles link=topic=545956.msg4002014#msg4002014 date=1338154851]
Hey guys,got a small problem
been coding this source like 3weeks,now i finally found out that my bows are named -2 if i wield them,this is probs a noob question but how could i fix this?
thanks in advance , Jelle
[/quote]
in item.conf make sure they have the right name for the right id. If not copy one of the items already in there and change the ID, name and description.[/quote]
they have the right name in item.cfg Which makes me feel wierd about it

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]my bows names are -2 if i wield them how do i fix

item.title: [PI]my bows names are -2 if i wield them how do i fix
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“heartles, post:1, topic:443268”]Hey guys,got a small problem
been coding this source like 3weeks,now i finally found out that my bows are named -2 if i wield them,this is probs a noob question but how could i fix this?
thanks in advance , Jelle[/quote]
in item.conf make sure they have the right name for the right id. If not copy one of the items already in there and change the ID, name and description.
